SourceProxy.label: GDAL Vector Reader
SourceProxy.name: GDALVectorReader

Documentation.short_help: Reads a vector file using the GDAL library.

SourceProxy.Documentation: GDAL Vector Reader is a source object that reads vector files and uses GDAL as the underlying library for the task. GDAL is required for this reader. The output of the reader is a vtkMultiBlockDataSet

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the GDAL Vector reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: AppendFeatures
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether features are appended to a single vtkPolyData. Turning the option on is useful when a shapefile has a number of features which could otherwise lead to a huge multiblock structure.

IntVectorProperty.name: AddFeatureIds
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether feature IDs should be generated. Some GDAL primitives (e.g., a polygon with a hole in its interior) are represented by multiple VTK cells. If you wish to identify the primitive responsible for a VTK cell, turn this on. It is off by default for backwards compatibility. The array of feature IDs will be the active cell-data pedigree IDs.

SourceProxy.label: GDAL Raster Reader
SourceProxy.name: GDALRasterReader

Documentation.short_help: Reads a raster file using the GDAL library.

SourceProxy.Documentation: GDAL Raster Reader is a source object that reads raster files and uses GDAL as the underlying library for the task. GDAL is required for this reader. The output of the reader is a vtkUniformGrid instead of vtkImageData to support blanking.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the GDAL Raster reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: TargetDimensions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the desired width and height of the image.
